languages.text: "Вольный Торговец! Как мне отрадно воссоединиться с {mf|избранником|избранницей} Императора!"

languages.text: "Rogue Trader! Being reunited with the Emperor's chosen is a balm to my soul!"

languages.text: “行商浪人！能与帝皇的神选者重聚，这让我的灵魂无比慰藉！”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! Being reunited with the Emperor's chosen is a balm to my soul!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人！能与帝皇的神选者重聚，这让我的灵魂无比慰藉！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Comerciante Independiente! Reunirme con {mf|el|la} elegid{mf|o|a} del Emperador es un bálsamo para mi alma!».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! Being reunited with the Emperor's chosen is a balm to my soul!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Comerciante Independiente! Reunirme con {mf|el|la} elegid{mf|o|a} del Emperador es un bálsamo para mi alma!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「自由開拓者よ！皇帝に選ばれし者との再会は、私の魂を癒やしてくれる！」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! Being reunited with the Emperor's chosen is a balm to my soul!"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者よ！皇帝に選ばれし者との再会は、私の魂を癒やしてくれる！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Mit {mf|dem|der} Auserwählten des Imperators wiedervereint zu werden, ist Balsam für meine Seele!"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! Being reunited with the Emperor's chosen is a balm to my soul!"

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande} ! Le fait de pouvoir être réunie avec {mf|l'élu|l'élue} de l'Empereur apaise mon âme ! »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader! Being reunited with the Emperor's chosen is a balm to my soul!"
